## 🧭 Explore the Website

### 🚀 Step 2: Essay on Shiny Apps

::: callout-tip
In this section, I explain what **Shiny** is and how it can be used to build interactive web apps with R. Designed as a lecture note to guide coworkers new to Shiny, you'll learn about `ui`, `server`, and how to deploy a basic app.\
👉 [Read the Essay on Shiny Apps](shiny-apps.qmd)
:::

### 🌐 Step 3: Essay on Shinylive

::: callout-tip
**Shinylive** allows Shiny apps to run entirely in the browser – no R server needed! In this lecture, I explain the technology, pros and cons, and key differences from traditional Shiny apps.\
👉 [Read the Essay on Shinylive](shiny-live.qmd)
:::

### 📊 Step 4: Interactive Dashboard

::: callout-tip
An interactive dashboard built using Quarto and R! Explore IMDb Top 250 movies by rating, release year, and more – with search filters and visual summaries.\
👉 [Visit the Dashboard](dashboard.qmd)
:::
